title: Transitional provision
context: ยง576B-902 Transitional provision. This chapter applies to proceedings begun on or after the effective date of this chapter to establish a support order or determine parentage of a child or to register, recognize, enforce, or modify a prior support order, determination, or agreement, whenever issued or entered. [L 1997, c 295, pt of ยง1; am L 2015, c 77, pt of ยง1] Note The effective date of Act 77, Session Laws of Hawaii 2015, is July 1, 2015.
